price: (56) And establish prayer and give zakāh and obey the Messenger - that you may receive mercy.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
